changelog.304.4r5: Split Generic Resource Groups, ex. Feces (Any Kind), into lists of resources for subsitutions. Removed those Groups.
changelog.304.4r4: Added Hidden DLC, set old Kibble recipes and Events recipes to Hidden.
changelog.304.4r3: Updated Kibble Engrams, added Focal Chili and Lazarus Chowder as complex resources.
changelog.304.4r2: Added Titan Terminal Engrams, Corrected City Terminal image.
changelog.304.4r1: Removed Weapons/Melee from Self, except for on Primitive+.
changelog.282.102r6: Updated Consumables/Food/Refined with Industrial Cooker, Removed Charcoal from Industrial Forge.
changelog.282.102r4: Added Boss Arenas category to Tek Terminal, Changed Aberration Portal category to Boss Arenas, Added Stations to Total Conversion.
changelog.282.102r3: Added Aberration, Ragnarok, Tek Portals, Updated other Portals with new portal assets, Added Categories to Total Conversion.
changelog.282.102r2: Fixed disconnected Engrams, moved Self/Refined category to be only P+.
changelog.282.102: Added Heavy Auto Turret, Updated Metal Billboard, Thatch Wall.
changelog.263.1: Changed Element to not be Complex, created an inf loop going back and forth between Element Shard and Element.
changelog.263.0: Updated all Boss Portals with new resources, names, and compositions.
changelog.260.0: Added Tek Trough. Updated Gasoline composition to reflect new changes.
changelog.259.0: Added Tapejara Tek Saddle. Updated all Vanilla Engram Level Requirements.
changelog.258.1: Updated Engrams with their proper folder locations.
changelog.258.0: Added all Engrams up to PC v258.0!
changelog.257.2: Updated all images to reflect new .webP image conversion.
changelog.257.1: Updated composition for Metal Spike Wall, Poison Grenade
changelog.257.0: Added Cloning Chamber, Tek Turret, Tek Grenade, Megalodon Tek Saddle, Daeodon Saddle
changelog.256.0: Added Engrams: Element, Element Shards, Saddles(Equus, Iquanodon, Mosasaur Tek), Kibble (Troodon, Pegomastax, Moschops, Allosaurus, Tapejara, Therizinosaurus) Structures (Tek Teleporter, Tek Generator, Vacuum Compartment/Moonpool) Added Resources: Element Shards, Eggs (Troodon, Pegomastax, Moschops, Allosaurus, Therizinosaurus, Iquanodon)
changelog.255.5: Updated Charcoal to not be crafted at Industrial Grill
changelog.255.4: Updated Compass to be crafted at Smithy as well as Self
changelog.255.3: Removed Preserving Bin from Refined category.
changelog.255.2: Updated some Engram compositions, added item id's, xp, and engram points
changelog.255.1: Added new darts (and forgotten old one, oops!) Also Bio Toxin and Ammonite Bile
changelog.255.0: Added all Engrams up to PC v255, including Boss Portals and Eggcellent Adventures
changelog.253.3: Database upgrade, replaced drawable for file/folder
changelog.253.2: Updated Total Conversion table with Fresh Meat and Rotten Meat (oops!)
changelog.253.1: Updated Dyes with yields of 5, Misc category (for Camera) added Smithy to station_id's
changelog.253.0: Added Camera, Tusoteuthis Saddle, Therizinosaurus Saddle
changelog.252.1: Added total_conversion table, to allow for easy resource conversions in the future

changelog.249.1: Updated C4 Charge with correct composition
changelog.249.0: Added Clown Mask Skin and its resources for Fear Evolved 2
changelog.248.0: Added Chalicotherium Saddle and Kaprosuchus Saddle

engram.name: Basic Kibble

engram.name: Simple Kibble

engram.name: Regular Kibble
engram.description: This pet food recipe has been carefully designed to give balanced nutrition to many medium creatures. Containing only the finest natural ingredients, it provides pets with the balanced nutrition they need. And with a taste they can't resist, they'll warm up to you in no time! Not intended for human consumption.
